title: Did a man at the Mandalay Bay Hotel do Vanish after an interview with him?
subtitle: The notorious website published an irrational and inaccurate conspiracy theory about a server worker who was said to have a brush with the gunman in Las Vegas.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: ==History==The Mandlay Bay hotel worker (Chad Nishimura) "disappeared" after he gave a reporter a description of the Las Vegas suspect's gun that collided with the "official novel."
